content:
FILE_WRITTEN:src/output_paths.py
DIR_STATE:["src/.DS_Store", "src/__main__.py", "src/artifacts.py", "src/bib_dedup_check.py", "src/config.py", "src/determinism.py", "src/estimators.py", "src/goal_33_toy_experiment.py", "src/io_contract.py", "src/io_utils.py", "src/manifest.py", "src/metrics.py", "src/output_consolidator.py", "src/output_path.py", "src/output_paths.py", "src/outputs.py", "src/pipeline.py", "src/plotting.py", "src/results_io.py", "src/results_schema.py", "src/run.py", "src/run_artifacts.py", "src/run_pipeline.py", "src/run_toy_experiment.py", "src/schema.py", "src/simulate.py", "src/toy_experiment.py"]
Implemented a single, configurable output-path helper that defaults to ./outputs, supports OUTPUT_DIR, and rejects absolute /outputs usage.
